dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so big news coming out of Romania in the financial tech space, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so big news coming out of Romania in the financial tech space, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, absolutely! The Global Credit Bureau, GCB, they've actually teamed up with CreditInfo from Ukraine to launch international FICO Scores there.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, FICO Scores in Romania, that's pretty significant. So who, like, who's going to be using these?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, F I C O Scores in Romania, that's pretty significant. So who, like, who's going to be using these?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB, in collaboration with Infodebit from Moldova, has launched international FICO Scores in the Republic of Moldova.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's pretty broad, um, banks, micro-finance organizations, even telecom operators, all kinds of lenders really. It's for things like issuing loans, monitoring portfolios, even quick loans.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's pretty broad, um, banks, micro-finance organizations, even telecom operators, all kinds of lenders really. It's for things like issuing loans, monitoring portfolios, even quick loans.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now banks, micro-finance organizations, telecom operators, and other lenders in Moldova can also use FICO Scores in their decision-making processes with regards to issuing loans, portfolio monitoring, issuing fast loans, and new products.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And I saw that, uh, it's all above board too, right? Like, the local Data Protection Agency approved it, and it meets CCPA standards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I saw that, uh, it's all above board too, right? Like, the local Data Protection Agency approved it, and it meets C C P A standards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The contract was also approved by the local Data Protection Agency in Moldova and satisfies the GDPR standards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally. Which is, you know, a huge stamp of approval. And GCB's Viktor Omarov was saying they're bringing their own expertise, but also, like, the best global practices. They've really seen quality of decision-making improve.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally. Which is, you know, a huge stamp of approval. And G C B's Viktor Omarov was saying they're bringing their own expertise, but also, like, the best global practices. They've really seen quality of decision-making improve.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ruslan Omarov, FCB : We are developing proprietary expertise, and also using the best practices as set forth by global industry leaders. By using the bureau's solutions in conjunction with our own cards, the quality of decision-making and the efficiency of credit organizations have increased several times over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. And GCB, they're not new to FICO either, are they? They've been an official provider since, like, 2010.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. And G C B, they're not new to F I C O either, are they? They've been an official provider since, like, twenty ten.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FCB has been an official FICO provider since 2014

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They've got a license for a bunch of countries, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, Romania now, of course, and other Eastern European nations. Their predictive analytics, uh, and machine learning tools, they're really top-notch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They've got a license for a bunch of countries, Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, Romania now, of course, and other Eastern European nations. Their predictive analytics, uh, and machine learning tools, they're really top-notch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FCB has been an official FICO provider since 2014 and has a license to distribute and sell FICO Scores, including in countries such as Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, as well as a number of Central Asian countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just GCB, FICO itself is super excited about this. Jane Hadlow from FICO called GCB an "important regional partner." She was saying they value their experience and data quality.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just G C B, F I C O itself is super excited about this. Jane Hadlow from F I C O called G C B an important regional partner. She was saying they value their experience and data quality.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: John Hadlow, Senior Consultant at FICO said: The First Credit Bureau of Kazakhstan is an important regional partner for us. We highly value FCB's experience and data quality

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's all about delivering high-quality analytics to, um, mutual customers. It really helps grow the relationship across the region. And that whole idea of financial inclusion, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's all about delivering high-quality analytics to, um, mutual customers. It really helps grow the relationship across the region. And that whole idea of financial inclusion, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We look forward to continuing to grow the relationship with FCB, across the region including our new project in the Republic of Moldova. Together we can empower lenders across the region with world class decisioning analytics, helping them grow even faster whilst promoting financial inclusion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text:
[overlapping] That's huge.
Because, like, the FICO Score, it really democratized access to credit in the US over 30 years ago. It gave lenders an unbiased way to assess risk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's huge. Because, like, the F I C O Score, it really democratized access to credit in the U S over thirty years ago. It gave lenders an unbiased way to assess risk.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 30 years ago, the FICO Score helped democratize access to credit in the United States by providing an unbiased credit risk assessment tool for lenders.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that's the thing. It became *the* independent standard. And now, the big challenge is bringing billions more consumers into mainstream financial services. This is, uh, like, the next chapter for FICO.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FICO and its scoring solutions have been the independent standard for impartial evaluation of credit risk, trusted by lenders for decades around the world. dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And they're not just in Romania, right? FICO works with bureaus in over 30 countries, like the US, Turkey, South America, so they've got this global reach.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely. So, this move in Romania is just another step towards empowering lenders, um, across the region with world-class decisioning analytics. It's pretty exciting stuff.
